contest-event.event-date: Nov. 8, 1896 D Intercolonial Band Contest Intercolonial Band Contest 0 Other Intercolonial Band Contest intercolonial-band-contest Although an earlier contest in Sydney in 1880 had borne the same title, the Band Association of NSW ran its inaugural "Intercolonial Band Contest" in 1896. The second event, in 1897, was advertised as for the "Championship of Australasia", and is considered to be the first in the sequence of Australian national championships (noting that the federation of Australia did not occur until 1901). Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round] Exhibition Building, Prince Alfred Park, Sydney, New South Wales, Australia (First Class) June 14, 2016, 3:22 a.m. April 25, 2017, 11:54 a.m. 1 Newtown Band [Australia] Thomas Mellor 2 Hobart Garrison Band Thomas Hopkins 3 Naval Artillery Volunteers ( Sydney) Jack Charlesworth 4 St.Joseph's (Launceston) Alex Lithgow 5 Glebe Borough John Devlin 6 Wollongong City J.
